content: this dainty bookmark is a perfect first project to try out a hairpin lace loom you only need a little bit of yarn so it s great for leftovers cast on tutorial may be found here 1 i ve created a tutorial video 2 to demonstrate the single_crochet edging keeping the gauge loose helps create a nice edge 1 http //www pomogolightly com/hairpin-lace-tutorials/ 2 http //www youtube com/watch v=tc0kui_uptk
